attributes.action: extend driving theory test’s between March-may due to covid-19
attributes.additional_details: The government should extend (1month) for anyone who booked a driving test which has been cancelled due to covid-19, to not be remade to sit your theory test again as it is not fair on the public
attributes.background: I had my driving test booked for 30th March 2020 but due to covid19 it was cancelled. Why should the public have to resit the theory test? there should be an emergency extended period for people up and down the country to pass there driving test(1month) if your theory test has expired due to Covid19
